author: smuzaffar
body: Thsi fixes the array-bound error we see for GCC 13 IBs https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/buildlogs/el8_amd64_gcc13/CMSSW_15_0_X_2025-03-26-2300/PhysicsTools/NanoAOD ( see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47628#issuecomment-2757298465)
title: [15.0][GCC13] Fix array-bound issue for JetTaggerTableProducer
